title: Paleo Muffin Recipes: Mouthwatering Muffin Recipes For Paleo, Celiac, And Gluten Free Diets. (Simple Paleo Recipe Series)
features: Paleo Muffin Recipes: Mouthwatering Muffin Recipes For Paleo, Celiac, And Gluten Free Diets.

Satisfy that sweet tooth in a healthy way. Whip up tasty and delicious muffins made from whole ingredients like almonds, coconuts and seeds. Enjoy classic sweet and savory favorites while making sure that you still get the hearty and high nutritional value. This recipe book offers paleo muffin recipes that stay true to the basics of the paleo diet, ensuring that you have, at your fingertips, a collection of easy to make, scrumptious and yummy muffins that both kids and grown ups will love. This recipe book includes: -Simple, easy to make paleo muffin recipes.-Basic paleo guidelines.-Tips on following the paleo method when baking.-A backgrounder on the paleo diet.
description: Elle Jean Pierre is a French-American wife and mother-of-three who loves nothing more than trying and creating new recipes for her family and friends to dig into. Like all mothers, Elle keeps a close eye on what her family eats and because of this she has created many recipe books following healthy lifestyle diets such as the Vegan and Paleo diets- all tried and tested by the family. She has partnered with Ready Recipe Books to make her titles available on Amazon's Kinlde store for your enjoyment.
